# a\(n\) \= 7\*\(10^\(2n\+1\)\-1\)/9 \+ 2\*10^n\.
https://oeis.org/A332179

## Maple
```Maple
A332179 := n -> 7*(10^(n*2+1)-1)/9 + 2*10^n;
```
## Mathematica
```Mathematica
Array[7 (10^(2 # + 1) - 1)/9 + 2*10^# &, 15, 0]
```
## PARI
```PARI
apply( {A332179(n)=10^(n*2+1)\9*7+2*10^n}, [0..15])
```
## Python
```Python
def A332179(n): return 10**(n*2+1)//9*7+2*10^n
```
